name: BakeWithBoxMap
description: Bakes Beam objects with a BoxMapping (by default the material is applied 'by layer' and has to be defined in the layer the objects are baked to).

inputParameters.name: BeamMapSize
inputParameters.description: Scaling of the BoxMap for Beams in x,y,z directions (list of three positive values) (optional).

inputParameters.name: PlateMapSize
inputParameters.description: Scaling of the BoxMap for Plates in x,y,z directions (list of three positive values) (optional).

inputParameters.name: BeamLayerName
inputParameters.description: Layer onto which the Beams are to be baked (optional).

inputParameters.name: PlateLayerName
inputParameters.description: Layer onto which the Plates are to be baked (optional).

inputParameters.name: Bake
inputParameters.description: Set to True to Bake. Nothing happens if None or False.
